legend_event_pm0889_12_00_zamazenta/5001:
I’ve never seen anything like it! It gave me such
a shock!

Based on what you’ve told us, I think what you
saw was a Pokémon called Eternatus.
Eternatus?

It’s a Legendary Pokémon that nearly destroyed
the entire Galar region in the past.

And we’ve battled it before! So it’s kind of like
our rival, really...
Wait, you actually battled something that huge?!
Well, Zacian and Zamazenta came to help us!

We got to fight along with them! It was
so exciting!

Yeah, I remember that! It was so intense, it makes
my heart pound just thinking about it!

That’s strange... When we saw Eternatus, it looked
like it was in pain.
In pain?
Do you suppose it was injured?
Maybe it was having trouble absorbing energy.

Eternatus has a core on its chest that absorbs
energy emanating from the Galar region. That
energy is what lets it stay active.

I bet it’s struggling to absorb energy here on
Pasio because it can’t find an energy source!
Um... So basically, it’s hungry?
I suppose, if you compare it to humans!

Wow! Spoken just like a future Pokémon
Professor, Hop!

Thanks! Sonia’s a professor now, and she’s been
teaching me a lot lately!

Oh, are you hoping to become a Pokémon
Professor someday?

Yeah! At first, I wanted to be the strongest
Trainer ever.

But as I traveled around Galar, I started thinking
that I want to be a professor and help Pokémon!
It’s great that you have a dream!

I’m pretty confident in my knowledge of Pokémon,
too! We should get together and talk sometime!

Yeah, that’d be great! I’d love to chat and
learn more!

Er... Though, I guess we’re getting off track. We
should figure out how to help Eternatus.

We still don’t know what brought it to a place that
doesn’t have any energy sources.

But no matter the reason, I think we should try to
find a way to help it!

Yeah! It caught me off guard the first time I
saw it, but I’d also like to help.

Let’s put our heads together and find a way
to help it!

Good idea! Will you help us, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Of course!
Great! We’re counting on you!
Leave it to me!
Thanks! I knew we could count on you!
Hm? Oh, Lee’s calling.
Hello?
legend_event_pm0889_12_00_zamazenta/5002: OK, I think I understand what’s going on.

First, we should probably figure out why Eternatus
is here on Pasio.

I’m going to meet up with Professor Bellis! Maybe
she knows what’s going on.

With your sense of direction, Lee, you’d just get
lost if you tried to find her lab by yourself.
I guess you’re right! Great thinking, Hop!

Then, let’s all go there together! It’s a race to
the professor’s lab!
W-wait! Lee! You’re going the wrong way!
It’s gotten much livelier now that Hop’s around!

It’s so exciting to be around friends you’ve
traveled with, isn’t it? I know that feeling
very well!

Yeah. Those are the kinds of friends you’ve shared
experiences with, good and bad.

I hope we can go exploring and make memories
together, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
legend_event_pm0889_12_00_zamazenta/5003: Welkom! And with perfecto timing, I might add!
I was just doing some research on Eternatus, too.

Wait, so you already knew about Eternatus being
here on Pasio?

Of course I did! We researchers are always
up-to-date on news in our field!

Also, Professor Sycamore is here helping us today.
He’s a pioneer in the field of Mega Evolution!

I’m currently looking into a new hypothesis I’ve
formed—that sync stones have some kind of
connection to Mega Evolution.

What?! I’ve read about Mega Evolution in some
books at the lab...

Are you saying Pokémon might be able to Mega
Evolve using these sync stones?!

Well, we already have some Pokémon here on
Pasio that Mega Evolve when they use their
sync moves.

The energy within sync stones is known to
have an effect on Pokémon.

It’s still a work in progress, but I’m looking into
the energy that these sync stones emit.
And now that Eternatus is here on Pasio...

I’m making tremendous progress on proving my
hypothesis! It’s all so very exciting!

I see! If Eternatus can absorb the energy from
sync stones...

then that’s probably why it came to Pasio! It all
makes sense!

But if that’s the case, why’d it look like it was
hungry and in pain?
Hm... Maybe there’s another reason.

Either way, the fastest way to solve this problem
would be to catch Eternatus!
What?! You want us to catch something so huge?
Precisely! That’s exactly what we’d like you to do!

I believe sync stones have the potential to affect
Pokémon in ways other than Mega Evolution.

An example of this is the Dynamax phenomenon,
which is said to be unique to the Galar region.

We haven’t seen any Pokémon here on Pasio
Dynamax because of their sync stones yet...

But I think that might change now that Eternatus
is here.

With Eternatus around, I believe there’s a chance
other Pokémon might start to Dynamax!

And if that happens all of a sudden here on Pasio
to sync pairs who don’t expect it...
It would cause mayhem all over the island!

That’s why we’d like your help capturing Eternatus
before anything like that can happen. Do you think
you can do it?
Understood!

I’m more than willing to help! I’ll gladly protect all
the sync pairs here on Pasio!
Merci! We’re counting on you!
I’ve been wanting a rematch with Eternatus...
This time, I’ll be sure to win!
legend_event_pm0889_12_00_zamazenta/5004:
So, this Dynamax phenomenon... It makes Pokémon
super big, right?

I don’t understand it myself... Is that really
what happens?
This must mean Professor Sycamore was right!

How can you be so calm? I guess you must be
used to this.

Yup! In Galar, we see Dynamax Pokémon in our
stadiums and in the Wild Area all the time!

Oh, Zamazenta’s ready to go! OK then, let’s get
together and launch an attack...

Though...if you’re not used to Dynamax Pokémon,
we might want to reconsider that.

*sigh* Bit more cautious than your brother,
aren’t ya.
No need to worry. We’ll help you out a bit.
Piers! Marnie! You’re here on Pasio, too?!

That’s our line, innit? You’re the one who just
got here, after all.
Let’s save the chin-wag for later. Here it comes!
legend_event_pm0889_12_00_zamazenta/5005:
We heard that Eternatus is on Pasio, and now
Pokémon are Dynamaxing all over the place!

Really? I hope Lee and the others can take care
of Eternatus soon...
Why don’t you go an’ help him out?

I would, but I can’t just ignore these
Dynamax Pokémon!

They need our help. I’ll head over to Lee once
they’re back to normal.
Don’t worry about it. Leave ’em to us.
Yeah, Marnie’s right! You should go!

I agree. After watching you three battle, I think
we can handle this now.
Yeah! We can help out over here!
It’s normal to worry about family.
Better to regret goin’ than not goin’ at all.

I’ve got my reliable little sis with me. We’ll take
care of things here.

No pressure, huh, Bro...
But you heard him, Hop. Just go.

I’m gonna go help Lee! Thanks for taking care of
things on this end!
legend_event_pm0889_12_00_zamazenta/5006: Whoa! What kinda Pokémon is that?!
Stand back! We’ll take care of it!
Here we go! Get ready to attack as a team!
legend_event_pm0889_12_00_zamazenta/5007:
Phew... We took down that Dynamax Pokémon
and got it safely back to its Trainer.

But there’s just too many Pokémon! We need to
hurry and find Eternatus.
Yeah. This is getting a bit out of hand...

OK! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Gloria! Let’s
launch an attack together—
What, you think you’ve got time to look away?
Yo! I came to give you a hand.
I figured this’d be a bit much—even for you!

Nessa and Bea are taking care of the Dynamax
Pokémon over there.

Gloria, [Name:PlayerNickname ], I need you to
take care of that other one!

That leaves the two of us to take care of this
fellow. You up for it, Leon?
Heh, of course! I am the Champion, after all!

Bring it on! Sorry to jump in on this little reunion
between you and Eternatus, but I’m gonna clean
this up nice and quick!

Should have plenty of time to snap a
selfie afterwards!

Sure! But first, we’ve got to take care
of Eternatus!
legend_event_pm0889_12_00_zamazenta/5008: Yeah, I thought it was strange, too.
Its attacks are strong but not very accurate.

Just like Hop and the others said, it seems to be
in pain...
Don’t worry. I think I know where it’s headed.
Hop? Is everything OK with your group?
They’re fine. Piers and Marnie showed up to help.

I see. Then let’s go together! We’re one step away
from Eternatus!
Hop! I’m glad you’re all right!

I’m glad you and [Name:PlayerNickname ] are
safe, too!

Looks like we’ve got enough of us here to take
down Eternatus!

I’ll go help Nessa and the others. There’s still a
lot of Dynamax Pokémon out there. They could
probably use a hand.

Then our group will deal with Eternatus! We’ll
definitely capture it!

I’ll show you the strength of Galar’s
greatest Champion!
legend_event_pm0889_12_00_zamazenta/5009: There you are.
Something’s wrong!
I know.

I think Eternatus is having trouble absorbing
energy from sync stones.

That’s why it’s on the verge of rampaging—and
why it’s been emitting Galar particles.
Really?
Yeah! At least...I think that’s why. Probably.
Probably?

Well, I’m still learning, y’know. I’m just going off
what Sonia taught me.
But I’m pretty sure I know how to solve this!
Pretty sure?
L-like I said, I’m still learning!

I know. Don’t worry—I believe in you! Let’s try
your idea!
I trust you, too, Hop. I’m proud to be your brother.
Gloria... Lee...
OK! I’ll give it a go!

Eternatus is probably suffering because it can’t
absorb the enormous amount of energy it needs!

So we just need to make sure it’s using that
energy correctly!
Oh, I think I get it now!

Since it has to take in sync stone energy,
that means...
it’s got to use sync moves!
Bingo! Exactly, Lee!
OK then! Eternatus!

To unleash a sync move, you need to team up
with a Trainer as a sync pair!
Why don’t you and I become partners, then?
Er... I guess it wouldn’t be that easy...

Then we have no other choice! I’ll prove to you
that you can trust me!

Let’s battle, Eternatus! I’ll show you the strength
of the Champion of Galar!
legend_event_pm0889_12_00_zamazenta/5010:
Don’t worry, Gloria! [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Leave the rest to us!

Thanks, Hop. I know you can win! Show ’em what
you can do!

Never thought I’d battle with you on the same
team, Lee!

Me too. But y’know what? We were always
together, even when we were apart.

Don’t worry too much about keeping up with me,
Hop. Just give it all you’ve got!

Our strength knows no bounds! We’ll show you
just how strong two brothers with the drive to be
the best can be!
We’re almost there! Keep pushing through!
It’s about time we finished this.

This battle was a lot of fun, Eternatus. But now it’s
time for the finale!
Feel the power of our sync stone!
legend_event_pm0889_12_00_zamazenta/5011: How are you doing? Feeling a bit better, are you?
I think you’ll be all right.
Don’t worry. I’ll take good care of you!
legend_event_pm0889_12_00_zamazenta/5012: So, what do you think? Looks good, right?

Yeah, you look great! And your outfit matches
Eternatus, too!

Exactly! I feel even closer to Eternatus when I
wear this sygna suit!

We still need to build a stronger bond to become
an ideal sync pair!

Hello hello, people of Pasio! Thank you for
attending our match today!

You’re in for a treat! We’re holding an exhibition
match—Eternatus versus Zacian and Zamazenta!

As a Champion, I have to look cool! So I’m
absolutely going for the win today!
Heh, I hate to burst your bubble, Lee...

But we’re coming at you with everything we’ve
got! Don’t think this is gonna be easy!
Wouldn’t dream of it! Not when I’m battling you!

You’re plenty strong. But as Champion, I have a
duty to win, no matter how strong you are.

Here we go! We’ll show this crowd the hottest
battle they’ve ever seen!
legend_event_pm0889_12_00_zamazenta/5301: Hey, Hop! Didn’t get lost, did you?

Really? You’re asking me if I got lost, Lee?
Of course not!

This reminds me of the time we went to pick up
Leon from Wedgehurst!

Oh, I remember that! You two weren’t even
Trainers yet!

Quick, Hop! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’ve
got to make a wish!

It takes hard work to make dreams come
true anyway!

OK! Tomorrow I’m off on another adventure so I
can make my dreams come true!
legend_event_pm0889_12_00_zamazenta/5302:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I have
something to tell you.

We have some reports of a meteor falling
into the ruins last night.

Luckily, nobody was injured, but we’re asking
everyone to stay away from it as a
safety precaution.

D’you think that could’ve been that shooting star
you saw last night?
Oh, hold on. I’ve got a call.

I saw this Pokémon at the ruins that I’ve never
seen before!

It looked like a dragon skeleton! And it
was gigantic!

Hmm... A gigantic dragon skeleton? Hop, are you
thinking what I’m thinking?
